EmailTemplate.name: 202006_Amer_HCE_Small-Form-Factor_Email.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Pre-orders open for new UAV Satcom
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See further with the most reliable SATCOM solution for UAVs Honeywell Satcom for UAVs is the smallest and lightest satellite communication solution enabling real-time video streaming and beyond line of sight communications with consistent global high-speed coverage.
UNIQUE CAPABILITIES:
- Real-time surveillance - The world’s smallest, lightest Inmarsat UAV/UGV solution - Highest performing SATCOM solution of its size, weight and price - Proven SATCOM solution for air, land and sea - Reliability, dependability and secure - Low power
Now available for pre-order! Reserve up to 10 units prior for priority delivery of units. Take advantage of special hardware and airtime service pricing too!
To learn more about Honeywell’s SATCOM for UAV and pre-ordering opportunities, please click below. CLICK HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/SFF-UAV-SATCOM?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_connectivityenablers_d&s]]>
